channel.title: Pro help needed :)
channel.description: currently got too npcs, npcid 1459 i think? at our staff zone you tele there and they are aggressive towards you, id like too make them non aggressive too people with player rights over 1. any ideas on how i could achieve that?

item.title: Pro help needed :)
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client) p; 
                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].2794,
                                    npcs[i].3322)
                                    > 0) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) {
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
                    client person = (client) p;</blockquote>

code atm is above, adding another bracket just adds another error anyone care try too edit this please?

item.title: Pro help needed :)
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

I'm not sure if this would work, but add this into your NPCHandler class - [code] for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client) p; 
                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    >= 5) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) {
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
                    client person = (client) p;[/code]</blockquote>

thanks for the reply ill post errors if they are any.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2009, 08:49:53 am[/size][hr]

3 errors, will this piece of code only apply too the two npcs at my staff zone ? would i not need too add my staff zone coords too it somewhere?

Read full topic

item.title: Pro help needed :)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I’m not sure if this would work, but add this into your NPCHandler class -

[code] for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    >= 5) {
                                if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) {
                                    npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
                    client person = (client) p;[/code]

Read full topic
